prompts: Create a playful water-type Pokemon with a blue body and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a small aquatic creature with a clown-like appearance and bright features.
Design a Pokemon that dances joyfully in the waves with a vibrant blue color scheme.
Show me a cute Pokemon that loves to entertain others with its playful tricks.
Generate a friendly water-type Pokemon that thrives in sea habitats and has a bubbly personality.
Make a whimsical Pokemon that resembles a seal and has a soft, cheerful demeanor.
Give me a water-type starter Pokemon that embodies joy and playfulness in its design.
